Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cells transfected with LRRK2 wild-type or mutant constructs.

Readout description.Result Description: Decreased cell viability observed for the p.M360V variant.
Significantly reduced cell viability for the p.G498R variant.
Marked decrease in cell viability for the p.Y537 deletion variant.
Reduced but less severe cell viability for the p.S740T variant.
Moderate reduction in cell viability for the p.A759H variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate for technical consistency.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 expression was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by Tukey's post hoc test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Cell viability greater than 80% compared to wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Cell viability less than 50% compared to wild-type controls.

Material used.Description: Protein expression levels were analyzed using immunoblotting with anti-LRRK2 antibodies.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced protein expression observed for the p.M360V variant.
Significantly reduced protein expression for the p.G498R variant.
Minimal protein expression detected for the p.Y537 deletion variant.
Reduced but detectable protein expression for the p.S740T variant.
Moderate reduction in protein expression for the p.A759H variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate for technical consistency.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 expression was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector lysate was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical comparison.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression levels comparable to wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression levels reduced by at least 50% compared to wild-type controls.

Material used.Description: Recombinant LRRK2 proteins were expressed in E. coli and purified for kinase activity assays.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced kinase activity observed for the p.M360V variant.
Significantly impaired kinase activity for the p.G498R variant.
Loss of kinase activity observed for the p.Y537 deletion variant.
Reduced kinase activity for the p.S740T variant.
Moderate reduction in kinase activity for the p.A759H variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three biological replicates were performed for each condition.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate for technical consistency.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 protein kinase activity was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Kinase-dead mutant (e.g., D539A) was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by Tukey's post hoc test was used for statistical comparison.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity levels comparable to wild-type controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity reduced by at least 50% compared to wild-type controls.
